Web Site Preview App

Fetch Site Metadata from a Web API

This code in this web app provides an example of using the built-in JavaScript fetch function
to call the linkpreview web API to get Open Graph (or alternate) metadata from a web site.

This is the type of metadata that social media sites or apps use to display a preview of a web page.

Enter a URL in the form below and click the "Fetch Site Metadata" button to see the site's title, description, and image.
